name: Toxic Trail
description:
You're an exterminator fighting Alien insects but your pesticid is leaking.

Protect the main lantern by plunging the insects into it.

Lure them with small lanterns.

The more time passes, the stronger the pesticid and the insects are and the quicker the lanterns are to put.

Your mission: EXTERMINATE THE MOST ALIEN INSECTS THAN YOU CAN !

  • WASD / Arrows : Move
  • E : Place lantern
